key.name: max-items-per-section
key.description: The maximum number of items shown in the menu sections. This applies to both Systemd services and Docker containers.

key.name: systemd-section-enabled
key.description: Show Systemd section in the menu.

key.name: systemd-section-items-priority-list
key.description: A comma-separated list of Systemd services which will be always shown on top

key.name: docker-section-enabled
key.description: Show Docker section in the menu.

key.name: docker-section-items-priority-list
key.description: A comma-separated list of Docker containers which will be always shown on top
